title: Splitting Adams (The Adam and Dr. Drew Show Classics)
itunes:title: Splitting Adams (The Adam and Dr. Drew Show Classics)
description: Wrestler and creator of the the DDP Yoga program Diamond Dallas Page joins Drew and Adam to talk about not only his fitness program but also his new fitness app. Adam and Drew discuss the cultural shift to overvaluing the opinions of young people. They then turn to the phones to speak about Adam's idea of non-lying lairs,
